divs: sighting detailsthree reddish\orange lights in diamond formation. no blinking. moving very fast and very smooth across the sky. going east-west across full sky in 1 min. or less. they were booking across the sky. they went from eastern horizon east west thru the foot of orion on way across center of night sky then westward. maybe clear the whole sky in 20-30 seconds. too smooth for them to be anything other than black ops or whatever..... john ps went outside looking for a second for pleiadies (the higher consciousness stars) and found them. wow.
Summary: Three reddish lights not flashing and moving fast
